name: PopOut (mistycow)
description:
PopOut is a connect four variant where you can also pop out a piece of your own in the bottom row.

Form a horizontal, vertical or diagonal line of four stones to win the game.

Music: https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-optimistic-mood-140181/

Sounds: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/

Libraries used:

https://github.com/josh-perry/peachy

https://github.com/kikito/tween.lua

https://github.com/rxi/classic
